alert.note: Alert for Marshall; Wetzel (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pittsburgh (Western Pennsylvania and East Central Ohio)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 23 at 2:28PM EDT until July 23 at 2:45PM EDT by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 245 PM EDT FOR MONROE...SOUTHEASTERN BELMONT...SOUTHEASTERN NOBLE...NORTHWESTERN WETZEL AND MARSHALL COUNTIES... At 227 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 7 miles southeast of Triadelphia to near Sistersville, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines, resulting in some power outages. Locations impacted include... Moundsville, New Martinsville, Woodsfield, Paden City, Powhatan Point, Glen Dale, Sardis, Beallsville, Clarington, Cameron, Fly, and Alledonia. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Please report severe weather by calling 412-262-1988, posting to the NWS Pittsburgh Facebook page, or using Twitter @NWSPITTSBURGH.
